name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CodeKitty AI - Chat with any Github repository!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Understand large Github codebases ,repositories with CodeKitty AI!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing CodeKitty AI: Chat with your Github Repository 

CodeKitty AI is a state-of-the-art Chrome extension created to simplify the process of understanding and navigating through large GitHub repositories. By utilizing advanced AI LLM models, CodeKitty AI offers in-depth explanations of files, folders, and code segments, making it easier to comprehend complex codebases and interact with them.

Key Features:
1. One-Click File Explanations: Easily obtain AI-generated explanations for all files and folders within a repository by clicking the "Explain" button.
2. One-Click Code Explanations: Receive comprehensive explanations of the entire codebase using the power of LLM by clicking the "Code Explanation" button.
3. Chat with your Code and Files: Interact with the code and files to understand the codebase better.
4. Selective Code Explanations: For lengthy code segments, you can select individual code blocks and tap the "Explain" button to get detailed explanations for specific sections.

How to Use CodeKitty AI:
1. Download the Extension: Install the CodeKitty AI extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Register: Upon installation, you will be directed to a registration page. Complete the registration process to start using the AI features.
3. Explore GitHub Repositories: Start effortlessly exploring repositories, utilizing one-click explanations for files, folders, and specific code blocks.

Enhance your GitHub experience with CodeKitty AI and gain a deeper understanding of complex codebases effortlessly. Download now and start exploring!
